title: OPL hype
body:
G'day,
Logging in this morning I was expecting an article on the OPL to be released and the schedule. I was also expecting there to at least be something on the main screen of the client about it. If I were in charge of making people more aware of the OPL I would make sure that each day the main story on the client is about the OPL. I know this is already done but I think the article gets changed to the OPL one too late in the day, it needs to be put on as soon as the clock ticks over to an OPL day.

Just my two cents

replies.body:
We've had some issues getting the website updated but it's all sorted now, although there are a few bugs we're still working on. 

To be honest you are right, this was sloppy and I take full responsibility. You all deserve better than having a schedule deployed 3 hours before the season starts. Not good enough of our part. There's no excuse.
In other news is there going to be a post on how the OOL will work this season? Would love an updated version
Yep, we'll be announcing that soon

Alright, they seem to have got everything I complained about in order now.
Riot OCE does a great job with everything, just a bit sloppy at times.

It's great that the client didn't update until I re-logged just then and give me the notification that OPL was live. Went to stream 'this stream is offline'. By the time I got any notification that this was on, it was over.
Definitely. I can't believe that the Schedule hasn't been made public the very day it is set to start. Let alone the fact that only people who currently follow the OPL know it starts tonight.
